name: HibiAPI
description: An alternative implement of Imjad API.

PIXIV_ACCOUNT_TOKEN.description: Refresh token for Pixiv account, leave blank if you don't need Pixiv API.

SAUCE_NET_API-KEY.description: API key for SauceNAO, leave blank if you don't need SauceNAO API.'

FORWARDED_ALLOW_IPS.description: Trusted IP addresses request contain forwarded information, leave * unless you know what you are doing.

GENERAL_SERVER_HOST.description: Listen connection from all host, don't touch.

GENERAL_SERVER_CORS_ORIGINS.description: Allowed CORS origin host, default to all.
